export var idCreator=function idCreator(){var date=new Date();var time=date.getTime();return time;};export var dateCreator=function dateCreator(){var date=new Date();var day=date.getDate();var month=date.getMonth()+1;//month start from 0
var year=date.getFullYear();if(month<10){month='0'+month.toString();}if(day<10){day='0'+day.toString();}return day.toString()+"."+month.toString()+"."+year.toString();};export var timeCreator=function timeCreator(){var date=new Date();var minute=date.getMinutes();if(minute<10){minute='0'+minute.toString();}var hour=date.getHours();return hour.toString().concat(":",minute.toString());};
